summary: Singularity moment with GPT-5, renewed great-power brinkmanship, and accelerated edge-AI releases.

events.details: Nuclear submarines deployed near Russia following Kremlin threats.
US military hits a Venezuelan vessel tied to Tren de Aragua smuggling network.
Sudanese Armed Forces down aircraft allegedly carrying UAE mercenaries.
OpenAI releases GPT-5 with agentic workflows and state-of-the-art reasoning.
Armenia and Azerbaijan sign a deal resolving their decades-long conflict.
Leaders meet in Alaska to discuss a roadmap for ending the Ukraine war.
Open-source efficient model optimized for smartphones is released.
Mixture-of-experts upgrade delivers near-GPT-4 performance at lower inference cost.

events.summary: Singularity moment marked by GPT-5 release and geopolitical brinkmanship.

events.details: OpenAI releases GPT-5 with agentic workflows and improved reasoning.
Armenia and Azerbaijan sign a peace deal.
Open-source, efficient model optimized for mobile devices.
